info.title: Cleva Channels life - Policy management
info.description:
This document describes all REST endpoints of the Cleva Channels life - Policy management.

All information contained herein is, and shall remain, the exclusive property of Inetum CLSW - Software Portugal, S.A. The intellectual and technical concepts contained herein are proprietary of Inetum CLSW and are protected by copyright law. It is strictly forbidden to disseminate, reproduce, transmit, distribute or otherwise use in any way the information and materials contained herein, unless an explicit and express prior written permission is obtained from Inetum CLSW - Software Portugal, S.A.

@2018-2025 Inetum CLSW

tags.name: Policy management
tags.description: Services related to the policy management

parameters.description: The id of the endorsement type configuration that will be deleted

parameters.description: The id of the endorsement type

parameters.name: endorsementId
parameters.description: The id of the endorsement

post.description:
This service allows switching the sum insured between funds or changing the policy funds distribution.

Note: Currently, the service only supports buying and selling funds and does not support changes to them.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.summary: Create endorsement to update policy collection account
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the collection account of a policy. 

This API instantiates a process/flow that orchestrates the integration with Cleva Life. 

It is applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

requestBody.description: Update billing of a policy request

post.summary: Create endorsement to update policy collection
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the collection details of a policy. 

This API instantiates a process/flow that orchestrates the integration with Cleva Life. 

It is applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.summary: Create endorsement to update policy collection date
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the collection date of a policy. 

This API instantiates a process/flow that orchestrates the integration with Cleva Life. 

It is applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.description: This service allows updating the sum insured and/or the premium instalment of a policy.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.summary: Create endorsement to update policy premium instalment
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the premium instalment of a policy. 

This web service instantiates a process/flow that orchestrates the integration with Cleva Life. 

It is applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.summary: Create endorsement to add an insured person to a policy
post.description: This service allows creating a request to add an insured person to a policy.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

requestBody.description: Add an Insured Person to an insured person request

post.summary: Create endorsement to exclude insured person from policy
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to exclude an insured person from a policy. 

This API instantiates a process/flow that orchestrates the integration with Cleva Life. 

The approval tasks are displayed in the task manager. These tasks can be executed: (1) in the task manager's front-end; (2) using the service that allows executing an action for a task service. 

It is applicable to risk life group products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Insured person id to be excluded

get.description: This service allows creating a request to add an insured person to a policy.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

patch.summary: Retrieve a request to add an insured person into a policy

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

requestBody.description: Add an Insured Person to an insured person request

post.summary: Create endorsment to update the beneficiaries of a person in a policy
post.description: This service allows creating a new request to update the beneficiaries of a person in a policy.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Insured person id to be updated

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Membership number

post.summary: Create endorsement to update sum insured of insured person of a policy
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the sum insured of an insured person of a specific policy. 

This API instantiates an approval or risk assessment process/flow, according to the sum insured update amount, and integrates with Cleva Life. 

The approval or risk assessment tasks are displayed in the task manager. These tasks can be executed: (1) in the task manager's front-end; (2) using the service that allows executing an action for a task service. 

It is applicable to risk life group products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The policy id to update

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Insured person id to be updated

requestBody.description: Update sum insured in a person request

post.summary: Create endorsement to perform multiple changes to the policy.
post.description: Create endorsement to perform multiple changes to the policy.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.summary: Create endorsement to update policy notice address
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the notice address of a policy. This API instantiates a process/flow that orchestrates the integration with Cleva Life. 

It is applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to cancel a policy. 

This API instantiates an approval process/flow that is integrated with Cleva Life. 

The approval tasks are displayed in the task manager. These tasks can be executed: 
(1) in the task manager's front-end 

(2) using the service that allows executing an action for a task service 

This service is applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.summary: Create endorsement to update policy sum insured
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the sum insured of a policy. 

This API instantiates a process/flow that orchestrates the integration with Cleva Life. 

The approval tasks are displayed in the task manager. These tasks can be executed: (1) in the task manager's front-end; (2) using the service that allows executing an action for a task service. 

Applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

post.summary: Create endorsement to update policy beneficiaries
post.description:
This service allows creating an endorsement to update the policy's beneficiaries. 

This API instantiates an approval process/flow that integrates with Cleva Life. 

The approval tasks are displayed in the task manager. These tasks can be executed: (1) in the task manager's front-end; (2) using the service that allows executing an action for a task service. 

It is applicable to risk life individual products.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: The id of the policy. The maximum length is 8 characters.

delete.description: Deletes all caches in the current environment.
Deletes a specific cache by its name in the current environment.

developerMessage.description: Detailed message. Not suitable to be presented in the user interface.

enum: TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL

List of funds to change.

forChannel.description: The channel where the policy was created

loginUser.description: Login user to request the change

branch.description: Id of the branch where the change request was made

byChannelApp.description: Id of the application being used in the channel where the request was created

effectiveDate.description: Effective date to update the premium installment of a policy

premiumInstallment.description: The new premium installment to be updated on the policy

dateNextReceipt.description: Rule for calculating the date of the next receipt (1: Next instalment date after effective date. 2: After the last periodic premium (default value). 3: On effective date )

createNextReceipt.description: Indication of automatic creation of the next receipt

createMissingReceipts.description: Indication of automatic creation of the missing receipts

value.description: Information value.    Note: It is the same field used for indicating the value of short and long additional information fields.    The size must match the information type (short additional information = 8 characters, long additional information = 30 characters).

type.description: Code identifying the additional information type. Info8: For short additional information fields.    Info30: For long additional information fields.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.request.Ad.description:
AdditionalInfo object.

The data included in the object is the following.

AdditionalValues object.

The data included in the object is the following.

attributes.description: Predefined id of a person attribute.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.request.Ad.description:
Address object.

The data included in the object is the following.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.request.At.description:
Attribute object.

The data included in the object is the following.

beneficiaryPersonId.description: Beneficiary's person id. Note: One of 'beneficiaryPersonId',  'beneficiaryId' or 'personData' must be indicated

beneficiaryId.description: Beneficiary's id. Note: One of 'beneficiaryPersonId',  'beneficiaryId' or 'personData' must be indicated

coverageCode.description: Coverage code. Note: If not specified, the beneficiary will be associated to all coverages.

type.description: type of clause. Death, Life, Disability.

percent.description:
Percentage to be received by this beneficiary.

Note: All percentages of the various beneficiaries of each type must total 100%.

relationship.description: Beneficiary's family relationship with the insured person.

irrevocable.description: If identified, the beneficiary cannot be changed without his consent

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.request.Be.description:
Beneficiary object.

The data included in the object is the following.

type.description: type of clause: Death, Life, Global and Disability.

coverageCode.description: Coverage code. Note: If not specified, the beneficiary clause will be associated to all coverages.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.request.Be.description:
BeneficiaryClause object.

The data included in the object is the following.

fieldId.description: Predefined id of a person attribute.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.request.Co.description:
ContextAddressFields object.

The data included in the object is the following.

idDocumentType.description: This parameter specifies the type of id document of a party. When creating a party, this parameter is mandatory, and together with the idDocumentValue and partyNationality parameters will generate the partyUniqueId parameter which will later allow searching for a party.

idDocumentValue.description: This parameter specifies the party's id document value. When creating a party, this parameter is mandatory, and together with the partyNationality and idDocumentType parameters will generate the partyUniqueId parameter which will later allow searching for a party.

partyUniqueId.description: This parameter identifies and allows searching for a party. This id will initially be generated by concatenating three other parameters: idDocumentType, idDocumentValue, and partyNationality.

gender.description: Party's gender, if a natural person.

maritalStatus.description: Code identifying the marital status of the party, if a natural person.

profession.description: Code identifying the party's occupation, if a natural person. Note: This field is mandatory, but it may be empty.

personBusiness.description: Code identifying whether the party is a natural or a legal person. Individual(I): Natural person and Company(C): Legal person

honorific.description: Partys title, if a natural person.

independentEntrepreneur.description: Indication if this party is a sole trader (individual entrepreneur)

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.request.Pe.description:
PersonData object.

The data included in the object is the following.

forChannel.description: The channel where the policy was created

loginUser.description: Login user to request the change

branch.description: Id of the branch where the change request was made

byChannelApp.description: Id of the application being used in the channel where the endorsement request was created

status.description: Request status of the endorsement request

policyId.description: Id of the Policy associated with the endorsement request

tenantId.description: Tenant id of the endorsement request

businessKey.description: Business key of the endorsement request

createDate.description: Start date of the endorsement request

endDate.description: End date of the endorsement request

effectiveDate.description: Date the change will take effect

insuredPeople.description: List of insured people to include in the policy

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.response.A.description:
AddInsuredPersonResponse object.

The data included in the object is the following.

code.description: Code identifying the reason for limiting the coverages or loading them

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.response.C.description:
CoverageReasonResponse object.

The data included in the object is the following.

status.description: Status of the coverage. This is used for history purposes.

indexationType.description: Type of price adjustment of the coverage (None, Fixed monetary value or Percentage of increase).

indexation.description: Price adjustment of the coverage in percentage or absolute value

loadedCoverage.description: Identifies the code of the coverage that is loaded.

exclusions.description: List of provisions limiting the coverage from specific risks.

percentage.description: Loading percentage applicable to risk coverage (loadedCoverage)

perThousand.description: Loading perThousand applicable to risk coverage (loadedCoverage)

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.response.C.description:
CoverageResponse object.

The data included in the object is the following.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.response.E.description:
ExclusionResponse object.

The data included in the object is the following.

entityId.description: The entity id that was stored on the database and can be used for retrieving purposes

personId.description: Person id. Note: One of 'personId', 'insuredPersonId' or 'personData' must be indicated

insuredPersonId.description: Insured person id. Note: One of 'personId', 'insuredPersonId' or 'personData' must be indicated

memberId.description: Member id. Note: If not specified, a new member will be created

relationship.description: Type of relationship of this person as regards the insurance policy. Used only for group products.

startDate.description: Policy member start date. Format: YYYYMMDD.

endDate.description: Policy member end date. Format: YYYYMMDD.

additionalValues.description: List of additional values of the main coverage.

additionalInfos.description: List of additional information fields per product configuration.

beneficiaries.description: List of beneficiaries of insured person

beneficiaryClauses.description: List of beneficiaries clauses of insured person

exclusions.description: List of provisions limiting the coverage from specific risks.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.aip.response.I.description:
InsuredPersonResponse object.

The data included in the object is the following.

idDocumentType.description: This parameter specifies the type of id document of a party. When creating a party, this parameter is mandatory, and together with the idDocumentValue and partyNationality parameters will generate the partyUniqueId parameter which will later allow searching for a party.

idDocumentValue.description: This parameter specifies the party's id document value. When creating a party, this parameter is mandatory, and together with the partyNationality and idDocumentType parameters will generate the partyUniqueId parameter which will later allow searching for a party.

partyUniqueId.description: This parameter identifies and allows searching for a party. This id will initially be generated by concatenating three other parameters: idDocumentType, idDocumentValue, and partyNationality.

gender.description: Party's gender, if a natural person.

maritalStatus.description: Code identifying the marital status of the party, if a natural person.

profession.description: Code identifying the party's occupation, if a natural person. Note: This field is mandatory, but it may be empty.

personBusiness.description: Code identifying whether the party is a natural or a legal person. Individual(I): Natural person and Company(C): Legal person

honorific.description: Partys title, if a natural person.

independentEntrepreneur.description: Indication if this party is a sole trader (individual entrepreneur)

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.updatebenefici.description:
Beneficiaries Clauses  object.

The data included in the object is the following.

forChannel.description: The channel where the policy was created

loginUser.description: Login user to request the change

branch.description: Id of the branch where the change request was made

byChannelApp.description: Id of the application being used in the channel where the request was created

effectiveDate.description: Effective date to exclude the insured person of a policy.

pt.inetum.cleva.psm.services.beans.Insur.description:
Insured person beneficiary endorsement object.

The data included in the object is the following.

forChannel.description: The channel where the policy was created

loginUser.description: Login user to request the change

branch.description: Id of the branch where the change request was made

byChannelApp.description: Id of the application being used in the channel where the request was created

effectiveDate.description: Effective date to exclude the insured person of a policy

type.description: Type of update on sum insured of the policy

additionalProperties.description: Map containing variables related with the type of update to be made

values.description: Map containing variables related with the type of update to be made

memberId.description: Member Id. Note: If not specified, it will assume the memberId = 1

year.description: Contract year to which the additional value applies.

pt.inetum.cleva.psm.services.beans.multi.description: Additional values to add/change in the coverage. For the loading coverages, the additional value includes the percentage/per thousand of the loading.

startDate.description: Date from which the coverage addition/changes should take effect.

endDate.description: Date from which the coverage addition/changes should end.

duration.description: Duration of the coverage in the contract (years or months according to the configurations).

paymentsDuration.description: Duration of the coverage's payment (years or months according to the configurations).

lifeSumInsured.description: The coverage's sum insured value (applicable, according to configuration, to life products like Universal life 7700).

deathSumInsured.description: The coverage's sum insured value (applicable to coverages in case of death like risk products).

indexationType.description: The types of indexation to consider for the coverage.

indexation.description: Price adjustment in percentage or monetary value.

loadingCoverageReason.description: Identifier of the reason for a loading coverage

additionalValues.description: Additional values to add/change in the coverage. For the loading coverages, the additional value includes the percentage/per thousand of the loading.

familyMemberSequence.description: The sequential number of the family member. When adding a new member, the code will generate it automatically. When removing or changing a member, it must be indicated in the payload (the same family member may have two different family member sequences in order to have different family-specific coverages associated).

coverageId.description: The coverage associated to the family member.

familyMemberId.description: The person's unique identifier for the role.

relationship.description: The relationship between the family member and the insured person.

insuredPersonSequence.description: The sequential number of the insured person. When adding a new member, the code will generate it automatically. When removing or changing a member, it must be indicated in the payload.

coveragesChange.description: The list of coverages to be added, removed or changed (excluding the main coverage).

fieldId.description: Predefined id of a person attribute.

idDocumentType.description: The identification type (i.e. NIF, Passport, DNI,...)

idDocumentValue.description: The number of the identification document.

personBusiness.description: The party type code (natural person or company).

maritalStatus.description: Code identifying the marital status of the person.

nationality.description: Country code representing the party's nationality.

profession.description: Code identifying the party's occupation, if a natural person.

forChannel.description: The channel where the policy was created

loginUser.description: Login user to request the change

branch.description: Id of the branch where the change request was made

byChannelApp.description: Id of the application being used in the channel where the request was created

effectiveDate.description: Date from which the policy's changes should take effect.

print.description: Indication to either print or not the change performed.

currency.description: The currency in the product configuration.

coveragesChange.description: The request's structure indicating the coverages' changes.

familyChange.description: The request's structure indicating the family's changes.

memberPersonChanges.description: The request's structure indicating the member persons' changes.

postalCode.description: The postal code of the street

value.description:
Information value.
    Note: It is the same field used for indicating the value of short and long additional information fields.
    The size must match the information type (short additional information = 8 characters, long additional information = 30 characters).

forChannel.description: The channel where the policy was created

loginUser.description: Login user to request the change

branch.description: Id of the branch where the change request was made

byChannelApp.description: Id of the application being used in the channel where the request was created

effectiveDate.description: Effective date to update the new sum insured.

changeOrigin.description: Origin of the change. CHANGE - Sum insured change requested (default value), UPDATE - Sum insured regular update.

type.description:
Type of clause.

M: Death.

V: Life.

I: Disability.

G: Global.

clauseClass.description:
This attribute allows defining the class of this clause.

0: Not characterized.

1: Mortgage company or priority beneficiary designation.

pt.i2s.psm.services.beans.Clause.description:
Beneficiary clause object.

The data included in the object is the following.

beneficiaryNumber.description:
Beneficiary number.

Numbering must be sequential.

type.description:
Type of beneficiary.

M: Death.

V: Life.

I: Disability.

percent.description:
Percentage to be received by this beneficiary.

Note: All percentages of the various beneficiaries of each type must total 100%.

remarks.description: Free text field for any remarks pertaining to the beneficiary.

relationship.description: Beneficiary's family relationship with the insured person.

irrevocable.description:
If specified, the beneficiary cannot be changed without his or her consent.

Also, if specified, the value must be '1'.

The same beneficiary cannot be specified simultaneously as annuitant and irrevocable.

annuitant.description:
If specified, the beneficiary is an annuitant in an annuity insurance. To be used only when type is 'V Life'.

Also, if specified, the value must be '1'.

The same beneficiary cannot be specified simultaneously as annuitant and irrevocable.

annuitantIncomeTaxNoDependents.description:
Number of dependents of the annuitant according to income tax laws.

Note: To be used only when the beneficiary is an annuitant.

annuitantIncomeTaxNoTaxpayers.description:
Code identifying the 'number of taxpayers' income tax status of the annuitant.

Note: To be used only when the beneficiary is an annuitant.

annuitantIncomeTaxSituation.description:
Code identifying the type of income tax situation of the annuitant.

Note: To be used only when the beneficiary is an annuitant.

pt.inetum.cleva.psm.services.beans.Benef.description:
Beneficiary object.

The data included in the object is the following.

forChannel.description: The channel where the policy was created

loginUser.description: Login user to request the change

branch.description: Id of the branch where the change request was made

byChannelApp.description: Id of the application being used in the channel where the request was created

effectiveDate.description: Effective date to update beneficiaries and beneficiaries clauses.

pt.inetum.cleva.psm.services.beans.Benef.description:
Beneficiary endorsement object.

The data included in the object is the following.

personId.description:
Party's unique identification number.

Note: It may be used to retrieve the policyholder's policies.

idDocumentType.description:
This parameter specifies the type of id document of a party.
When creating a party, this parameter is mandatory,
and together with the idDocumentValue and partyNationality parameters will generate the partyUniqueId parameter which will later allow searching for a party.

idDocumentValue.description:
This parameter specifies the party's id document value.
When creating a party, this parameter is mandatory,
and together with the partyNationality and idDocumentType parameters will generate the partyUniqueId parameter which will later allow searching for a party.

partyUniqueId.description:
This parameter identifies and allows searching for a party.
This id will initially be generated by concatenating three other parameters:
idDocumentType, idDocumentValue, and partyNationality.

birthDate.description: Party's date of birth. Format: YYYYMMDD.

personBusiness.description:
Code identifying whether the party is a natural or a legal person.

I: Natural person.

C: Legal person.

personBusinessDescription.description: Description of the party as a natural or a legal person.

gender.description:
Party's gender, if a natural person.

M: Male.

F: Female.

genderDescription.description: Description of the party's gender, if a natural person.

independentEntrepreneur.description: Indication if this party is a sole trader.

honorific.description: Party's title, if a natural person.

maritalStatus.description: Code identifying the marital status of the party, if a natural person.

maritalStatusDescription.description: Description of the marital status of the party, if a natural person.

profession.description:
Code identifying the party's occupation, if a natural person.

Note: This field is mandatory, but it may be empty.

professionDescription.description: Description of the party's occupation, if a natural person.

retirementAge.description: Age of retirement, if a natural person.

fatcaSubject.description:
Party is subject to FATCA reporting.

0: No.

1: Yes.

2: Unspecified.

crsSubject.description:
Party is subject to CRS reporting.

0: No.

1: Yes.

2: Unspecified.

contextPersonFields.description:
Context-related user-definable party information attributes.

Note: To be used only when a context is specified (FATCA, CRS, ...).

contextAddressFields.description:
Context-related user-definable party address attributes.

Note: To be used only when a context is specified (GENERAL, FATCA, CRS, ...).
